name: @ep-npm/fonda
description: An async pipeline approach to functional core - imperative shell.
author: Elastic Path Software

scripts.test: yarn shadow-cljs release test && node dist/test.js
scripts.deploy:release: make clean && make jar && scripts/prepare-release && scripts/deploy-jar -j ./fonda.jar
scripts.deploy:snapshot: make clean && make jar && scripts/prepare-release --snapshot -s && scripts/deploy-jar -j fonda.jar
